metadata.inclusion:
1. Triple-press the add button once the Z-Wave module is on the device.
2. The LED will show a quick blink once per second while the module is being added.
3. Upon successful inclusion, the Z-Wave module LED will flash 3 times.
4. If inclusion fails, the LED will simply stop its blink pattern.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Triple-press the button on the Z-Wave module.
2. The LED will show a quick double-blink once per second while the module is being removed.
3. Upon successful removal, the Z-Wave module LED will flash 5 times.
4. If removal fails, the LED will simply stop its blink pattern.
metadata.reset:
1. Press and hold the button for 10 seconds.
2. The LED will go off, then release the button.
3. The LED will flash once as the module resets.
